\nTo get your API key:\n1. Log in to you:
To get your API key:
1. Log in to your Hystruct dashboard
2. Click on your profile picture (top right)
3. Click **Settings**
4. Click **API Keys**
5. Copy and paste your API key here
Create and queue a new job to run for a: 创建并排队一个新的任务来运行工作流
The ID of the workflow to run: 要运行的工作流的 ID
Triggers when a workflow event occurs (e: 发生工作流事件时触发(例如作业完成，数据更新)
## Webhook Setup\n\nTo receive workflow:
## Webhook Setup

To receive workflow events, set up a webhook in your Hystruct dashboard:

1. Log in to Hystruct and go to **Integrations**
2. Click **Webhooks** → **Create webhook**
3. Paste this URL as the Webhook URL:
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
4. Select the events you want to subscribe to
5. Optionally enter a Workflow ID to filter events
6. Click **Save**
